name: SNOMEDCTCancerDisorders
title: SNOMED CT Cancer and Malignant Neoplastic Disorders
description: A ValueSet for active cancer (活動性癌症). Includes all malignant neoplastic diseases with active clinical status, excluding specific skin cancers.
copyright: This ValueSet includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

parameter.name: exclusions
parameter.valueString: Excludes: Basal cell carcinoma of skin (254637007) and Squamous cell carcinoma of skin (254632001)
